content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main point of disagreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The main point of disagreement was the rental price. The potential tenant was hoping for a lower price, while I, as the landlord, was aiming for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 7.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended because there was no such incident that occurred during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
